title: Stefano Pondaco
text:
Stefano Pondaco (born May 4, 1989 in <a href="Vibo%20Valentia">Vibo Valentia</a>) is an Italian professional <a href="Association%20football">football</a> player currently playing for <a href="Serie%20D">Serie D</a> club SCD Ligorna 1922.
Career.
Ligorna 1922.
Ahead of the 2019-20 season, Pondaco joined <a href="Serie%20D">Serie D</a> club SCD Ligorna 1922.
